showroom.address: Serene Heights Sales Gallery Persiaran Serene, Serene Heights, 43500 Semenyih, Selangor Darul Ehsan, Malaysia
showroom.operating_hours: Weekdays: 9.30am to 5.30pm Weekends and Public Holidays: 10.00am to 5.00pm

description: Life is filled with simple pleasures. At Serene Heights, you can relive these little gifts that bring so much joy. Come and rekindle the fond memories of your childhood at the dedicated green zones and recreational parks.
